Moving to Platform/UI. The problem seems to be in AccumulatingProgressMonitor.
internalWorked. There are chances that the collect become null between the if 
and the synchronized.
*** Bug 76485 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I am rolling back the changes that Silenio requested as we are having a lot of 
concurrency issues with them (such as this). As Silenio never released the 
code that requires this change this should not cause any trouble.

See Bug 76583 for the original issue
*** Bug 76865 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
